Or at least it would be if you didn't get lost that is. You wander around a little bit and spot another road. You follow the road, hoping it leads you out of the woods. Though to your surprise, the road instead led you to possibly the biggest mansion you had ever seen.

Also, despite being in the middle of nowhere, it looked surprisingly well kept, For whatever reason, it had a certain allure to it and despite your better judgment, you find yourself wanting to go in and enter. You walk to the entrance of the mansion, surprisingly, it was unlocked, you enter and then you hear a rather disturbing sound

*Click*

The door had just locked it's self and locked you in somehow. You look around and it appeared that this part of the mansion was just a long corridor. You walk down the corridor and at the end was what appeared to be an elevator. You enter the elevator. You hear a robotic voice. It sounded feminine

"Greetings and Congratulations, you have been chosen to fulfill your personal fantasy"

You jump, getting a little startled from a voice that had seemingly come from nowhere. "Do not be afraid, I'm the Fantastically Efficient Technological Informative Super Hardware ". That name did not make any sense to you unless it was in the form in an acronym. "FETISH?" you ask "That is correct" FETISH said. "Well FETISH, can you tell me how to get out of here?" you ask. "The guest is not allowed to leave until his or her fantasy is complete." FETISH stated. "Now please be patient while I analyze your fetish in order to set-up your fantasy......,,,,,,,Fetish:Foot Fetish and perhaps others......... What kind of names were those, they don't even sound like they were rooms or areas of a mansion. Then again, this is no ordinary mansion. Though, you still had one question on your mind. 115332222222222222222222222222222121.content:
Tsuyu was always been one of your favorites. She is just so damn adorable! With that in mind, you eagerly walkthrough the door! Only to fall to face first to a hardwood floor. Not the most glamorous way to enter a new reality.

"That is going to leave a mark.…" You groaned and rub a tender spot on your forehead. FETISH never said anything about just flatfoot dropping you into it! Your eyes examined your surroundings and thus noticed you are in some person's living room. Curious, you studied at a nearby family photo. Your eyes squinted as the sight of the family of five. while noting…their froginess. I mean Pops over here is literally a toad who is a wearing toupee and a suit! And the oldest child…wait a minute is..that..that Tsuyu?!

'I guess..this is her family?' You quite dumbly looked at the photo, you still on season one of the anime and wouldn't dare look at spoilers. So this is a big surprise to you. But it is very nice to see her and her siblings take after their mother side of the family.

You gently put the photo back on the mantle, and simply looked at the room you are in. Hard to believe you are really in an anime, everything just looks so normal. Before you know you noticed someone is laying on the couch. Curious, you slowly walk towards the mysterious person; only to see it was Tsuyu in the flesh!

The froggy girl was laying on it, wearing only a simple green t-shirt and yellow. Your face became beet red as examined her, and a subtle bulge became apparent in your pants. Despite her relatively short stature, her legs were damn impressive; lean and toned. And her backside was kinda small but it is also was plump and…thicc. But her greatest quality was her bare feet which are on the armrest. Crossed and facing downward. Those gumshoes were gigantic, incredibly fitting considering her powers and such. Her feet were a near perfect combination of muscular and high arched lengthiness and the plumpiness of having meaty and fat foot flesh. She had smooth looking callused heels and balls. And the smaller bulbous digits were long and pudgy.

Her soles were noticeably had dust on.them, and somehow kinda moist. Your lips quivered uncontrollably at the sight, you have made the right damn choice. And to make even better, you noticed some discarded sandals on the floor, they undeniably belong to her. They were in a dark green color and had cute yellow flowers on the straps.

Your hand gingerly grabs the footwear, your eyes widen at the sheer size. They were roughly big as your entire arm. Your finger pressed on the deep black insole, noting that it is pretty warm and moist. The appendage eagerly traces along the outline of her foot, just marveling at the squishy texture.

You dropped the shoe and brought your fingers to your face. Your head slightly recoiled at the smell. It is a very potent "perfume" of very sour cheese and vinegar, that is mixed with mud and dirt. Your head shook at the "sample" of the girl's feet, your teenaged libido finally reached new heights of arousal.

'Enough foreplay. It's time to din-'

"Can I help you. And What are you doing?" A very familar voice interrupted your line of perverted thought. You slowly turned to very much wake Tsuyu who is blankly yet sternly looking at you with a faint blush.

Next few minutes was just the two of you just looking at each other. The both of you lost for words. You were in total shock of seeing one of your favorite characters. While Tsuyu is...very conflicted.

She was just relaxing after some hard training for the entrance exam for U.A that is next week from now. But all suddenly this older boy who appeared in her home, and it got worse from there. While she does feels very flattered and flustered that you like her body and especially her big ugly feet. But she can't help but be very creeped out and angry at this blatant invasion of her privacy.

But either of them said anything and continue to gawk at each other...

What happens next?

Before you can stop yourself, you open the door and step in. You are greeted by a sight you thought you'd never see, but one you'd love to see again.

"But, I believe you were promised a prize." Chun-Li continues. Setting her bare feet on your lap, the only part of her that seems to be dry, she looks at you, through gorgeous eyes.

The look in her eyes is dead-serious, so you flinch a bit after looking into her steel-blue eyes. 1231221111.content:
You jolt back to consciousness. Gasping for breath, you realize you are still in the revolting boots, in the toe section at that. You shakily rise to your feet, but fall to a kneel, your muscles completely worn out. Suddenly what looks like a wisp floats down the shaft of the boot and stops before you. It forms into an ephemeral image of Sylvanas. "So boy, are you ready to tell me who you work for and why you're here?"

"I already told you, I don't even know how I got here!" You shout back at her. You don't know what you could possibly tell her that would satisfy her, and by now just want this to end, even if she kills you.

Sylvanas glared at you for a moment, the smirked ruefully. "None has ever resisted this far into my interrogations... I'm inclined to respect you a little human. In fact, I'm going to make a monument of you"

You're utterly confused, seeing a light at the end of the tunnel at last, "really? A monument dedicated to me?"

The smirk returns as the insole suddenly feels like quicksand, pulling you in, "No, a monument OF you. A reminder to any others who resist this far that things can always get worse." The wisp form changes into an illuminated mirror floating above you. You're forced to watch as the insole sucks you in up to your neck. Then the old leathery material spreads up and over you, and starts distorting your face. In moments, it's done. You struggle to do more than breath, but it's impossible. Your eyes are cartoonishly large, stuck open and terrified at the end of the toe section, darting madly looking for any escape, but doomed to always watch waiting for your wearer, or to stare helplessly at the tips of her toes. Likewise your nose is spread from the tip of the toe of the insole to just under her toes with your mouth from there to the ball of her foot. You're no longer a human. You are a living decoration in her footwear.

The wisp flies to the heel of the boot. "Enjoy the life your bravery has earned you, adventurer. If you're lucky, I'll give these boots to a favored minion when I'm through with them... in a few hundred years!" There is an evil laugh as it disappears. You struggle fruitlessly to move again, then notice the atmosphere getting thicker as the light at the end f the boot gets dimmer, along with your hopes.

As you enter the doorway, there is a bright white flash of light causing you to shield your eyes with your arm. It lasts for about 5 seconds then stops. When you pull your arm away, you notice that the doorway you entered is gone and that you are on top of what appears to be a Castle tower overlooking a beautiful moat and valley. It appears to be late at night with a gorgeous full moon illuminating everything below. You notice that even your clothes have suddenly changed and that you are now wearing a cloak, armor and sword reminiscent of one of the game’s characters.

Wow you think, whatever the technology behind this mansion is…it’s really good. The environment looks incredibly realistic. You touch one of the stone bricks making up the castle balcony. It feels exactly like you would imagine it’s supposed to feel…hard and cool to the touch. You are amazed. Everything about this place…the colors, sounds and smells all help to create the impression that you’re experiencing a real-life Heroes of Might and Magic world for yourself.

Suddenly you hear footsteps behind you. You notice torchlight coming out of a passageway and realize that someone is coming toward you. Caught off guard you stumble backwards crashing against the floor with a loud clang.

The footsteps approaching immediately get quicker. “Is someone there?” a female voice calls.

You stand up just in time to find yourself face to face with the lovely Queen of Erathia Catherine Ironfist. She always looked hot in the game but she’s even prettier in person. She looks to be about 5’8” with a slender, curvaceous and athletic body that even a supermodel would kill for, fire orange hair which seemed to shine in the torchlight and a gorgeous face to match.

Her clothing looks like it does in the beginning of the opening of game. She’s wearing a gold-lined white top which seemed to accentuate her gorgeous body, a purple cape, a small golden crown and belt, two metal bracers and what looks like the bottom half of a two piece swimsuit. ^_^ She also was wearing long black leather boots that went up to her thighs. You notice that she is not wearing any of her armor. You suppose that makes sense since she isn’t going into battle but she still wears a sword on her hip to defend herself.

For a second the Queen looks at you surprised but she quickly composes herself. Taking a moment to examine you carefully under the torchlight, Catherine…

Your heart did a backwards flip. You loved Isabel and she was your favorite character in Heroes of Might and Magic V. You had always wondered how her feet would look like. Though you wonder if theres anymore Heroes of Might and Magic babes. You could always ask FETISH for another option if you so desired.

You decide to....
123312.title: Another Queen

12333.content:
You decide that you would like to see what other choices you have.

"What other doors do you have Fetish?" you ask the omnipotent voice.

A single door appears on the wall.

"This is the League of Legends Door, and it has been quite popular as of late," says Fetish.

You wonder if you should enter the door or if you would like to view more choices.
12333.title: See What Other Games There Are.

choices: A non-human champion (Cass, Kayle/Morigan or Yordle)
123331.content: Time to check out the hot women of League of Legends! So many choices!!!
123331.title: Enter the LoL door

1233311.content:
There are a ton of human feet to love in League of Legends... best divide them into Good/Evil.

Do you fancy a ride on the wild side or with someone who is pure and noble?
1233311.title: A human champion.

12333112.content: You enter a gloomy-looking, blackish purple door bearing the symbols of various evil LoL factions, including Noxus and Zaun. The hall is dreary and dark but just light enough for you to see the first door: Katarina.
12333112.title: Evil Champs (like Katarina)

choices: Tied to a chair about to be interrogated by Katarina.
123331121.content:
Katarina is an awesome choice and you make that selection and the world goes black for a moment.

When light returns you find yourself...
123331121.title: Katarina

choices: These boots are made for smelling
A nice, long and very smelly face massage
1233311211.content:
As you open your eyes, you notice, that you got tied to a chair. "Finally awake?" says a voice right next to you. "Gotta say, it was pretty hard getting you here!" As you look to your right you see your Red-haired kidnapper leaning onto the wall.

"You know why you're here! I want some answers! Tell me where the Officer is and you might not get hurt. It's as simple as that!" You didn't know what she was talking about and tried to explain it to her. "I can't stand liars. Tell me where he is. Last Chance!" You again try to explain her, that you don't know anything about some Officer, but she still doesn't believe you. "It seems like you want to be punished. You are as dumb as you look", she laughs at you. "Well then. Let's start your punishment. Maybe I can knock some sense into your brain."

She kicks her heavy boots right into your stomach, almost making you puke from the pain. "Are you interested in a conversation now?" she asks in an innocent voice. The pain makes it really hard for you to think straight, but you try making up an lie just to get out of this situation. You tell her, that the Officer is long gone and that he didn't tell anyone where he went. "I wish I could believe you, but I see, that you are lying to me again." she kicks your body multiple times, making you cry out loud from the pain until she suddenly stops.

"Maybe this isn't the right torture for you. Maybe they prepared you for a torture like this. How about we change things up for a while?" she puts your chair back up and wipes the blood off your face, almost making you feel safe for the minute. "How do you like my boots? Aren't they pretty? Skintight, no room for air and on my feet 24/7. You got so used to their outside, that I didn't even think about showing you their inside! And trust me, it's a rather nasty one", she said, with a kinky smile on her face. "I had them for ages and I'm so busy with hunting guys like you down, that I often forget to give my feet some fresh air." As she continues to tell you about her feet, you start to get more and more excited.

"Maybe you can help me relax a bit?" You wanted to say yes, but you couldn't make it obvious to her, that you want to see her feet. "Let's take one of them out!" As she starts to take off her boot, your nose starts tingling. A strong hint of sweat and sweat-filled leather replaced the air in the room although her foot isn't even out of her boot. "Look at your face! You can smell it already, don't you? If you talk now, maybe I'll open the window and you can breathe fresh air again!" You stay silent. "Ok, your choice." She finally puts her foot out of her boot, exposing her dirty sole with little shining sweat drops on it. You take a deep breath of air, which was already 100 % replaced by foot smell, further growing your excitement. "Phew! Looks like you are going to suffer pretty bad. You look like you're already getting dizzy and my foot isn't even near your face! Don't fall unconscious now!" You tried to look away from her foot but you couldn't, you were almost hypnotized by her constant wiggling toes. "Now! How should I start?"
1233311211.title: Tied to a chair about to be interrogated by Kat...

choices: ...chained to a bed inside a bedroom
12333112112.content:
"Maybe I'm a bit too selfish. This isn't about me, it is about you." She said in a very innocent tone. "I'm sorry for beating you up, really. Maybe a nice long massage would help ease your pain" You didn't know what she meant with "a nice long massage" all you really thought about was her smelly foot.

"Let's take the other one off." She said while reaching to her other boot. She took the other boot off, making the air in the room almost unbearable for you. "Here they are! Your masseurs for tonight!" You now started to understand. "Let's make this a bit more comfortable." She said. She grabbed a chair right next to her and sat down on it.

"Let's start your massage." She lifted her feet right in front of your face. You took a deep sniff of her feet. Now, that they were right in front of your face, you thought, that they could literally be used as a powerful weapon against even the strongest men. She started rubbing her feet on your face, almost making you faint.

"Do you like your massage?" she said in a very mocking tone. "I sure as hell enjoy it!" she laughed. She grabbed your nose with the toes of her right foot. "Inhale!" she commanded. You took a very deep sniff, which made you feel really dizzy. You started to faint and fell to the ground. "Too much?" Katarina said before she started to laugh very loud, which were the last things you heard before you completely lost your consciousness

Hours later you start to wake up. As you open your eyes, you notice, that you are...
12333112112.title: A nice, long and very smelly face massage

123331122.content: You go down to the next door, dimly lit by dancing lights that appear and reappear. The name on the door reads: Leblanc.
123331122.title: Travel Further

1233311222.content: Not fully pleased with the Lady of the Black Rose, you continue down to the next door. It's the darkest of the doors you've seen so far and seems to almost radiate with black energy. The name on the door reads: Syndra.
1233311222.title: Another Option

12333112222.content:
The next door seems very out of place. It looks like it's been destroyed and rebuilt several times and barely hangs on its hinges. You hear a shrill laugh coming from the other side. This is Jinx's door.

The hall grows cold further past her door.
12333112222.title: What's next...

choices: Quickly move your hand away from the leg, shaking your head
Slowly move your hand to the ground, nodding cautiously
123331122221.content:
The shrill laughter piercing your ears makes you too curious to resist. You push the door open, accidentally knocking it off its hinges, and walk through.

*KABOOOOOOOM*

An ear-shattering explosion causes you to lose your hearing upon entering the room. Your vision blurs as well as smoke and debris flies around you. Ears ringing and eyes dusted, you fall to the ground and begin crawling for safety.

*FWOOOOSH*

Another explosion reverberates along the ground, causing you to fall over on your side momentarily before regaining your balance and continuing on. As more and more bombs fly, you realize your hearing and vision won't be returning anytime soon. You start to get second thoughts and attempt to turn around to crawl back to the entrance. After all, what's the point of being here if you get blown to pieces before getting to live out your fantasy?

You turn and start crawling back the way you came, not entirely sure if it's correct since you can't see, when suddenly you bump into something. You reach out with a hand to feel what it is. Surprised, you feel a boot. Moving your hand up along the boot, you reach the soft skin of a human leg.

You hold your hand there for about 20 explosion-free seconds, allowing your head to clear. Then you look up to see a wide-eyed, petite girl with blue pigtails grinning down at you, clearly amused. What's more unnerving is the large, fish-shaped bazooka aimed right at your face.

"How long do you think he's going to sit there holding my leg, Fishbones?" she says, gazing at her bazooka.

"He looks kind of frightened. Maybe you should help him up and escort him out the door..." she replies, mimicking a deeper tone.

"No way. I think he just likes my leg," she looks back down at you. "Don't you, loser?"
123331122221.title: Get Jinxed!

1233311222212.content:
You realize you'd been holding onto her leg for a few seconds too long out of fear of your surroundings. Upon her inquiry, you move your hand off her leg and nod, hoping to avoid offending her.

BAM!

You feel a crushing blow against your face as Jinx slams her knee against it. Your hands both instinctively jerk to your sore mouth, simultaneously shielding and rubbing it.

"Haa haha! I guess since you like my legs so much, you won't mind seeing them up close again!" she laughs wildly as she slams her knee into your forehead.

"And again!" she exclaims before kicking you in the chest with the bottom of her boot, shoving you onto your back, "and just for good measure, one more time!"

She delivers a stomp down on your stomach, causing you to lurch upwards as the breath escapes your lungs. She hops around your body as you lie there, clutching and rubbing various parts of your sore frame, till she finishes her happy dance with a plop down onto your stomach, forcing you to lurch upwards again. She rests her boots on either side of your head as she grins crazily at you.

"I was surprised to see anybody moving around in all my explosions. I thought everyone in here was already dead or gone! So I was super super glad to have another plaything for a while. Heeheeheehehuaah!"

Dead or gone? Plaything? That doesn't bode well. You manage to sneak a few peeks to the side while she's busy laughing at the sky. As expected, all the buildings in the area have been torn to shreds by various explosions. When her laughter stops, you find her staring through your face with her typical creepy grin.

"What should we do next? Huh, plaything?"
1233311222212.title: Chaos Begins

choices: Forcing you to lick her boots clean
Forcing you to beg for mercy while she kicks you more
12333112222121.content:
Shuddering and intimidated by this clearly insane individual, you carefully begin to speak.

"Maybe we can--"

Before anymore words can exit your mouth, Jinx slams her boot down over it, grimacing menacingly in your direction.

"Shush! Toys can't talk you moronic plaything! Now...I have to think of how to use you next."

While she sits on top of you with her boot on your mouth, you can't prevent some of her bot grime from slipping through your lips. You swoosh your tongue around to clear it out and wind up licking against the boot, getting some of the grit on your tongue. It tastes like dirt, gunpowder, and rubber. You keep yourself from swallowing the nasty combination, trying to remain compliant while she ponders.

"Hmm, since I killed so many people with Fishbones, maybe I could let Powpow have some Chowchow, or maybe..."

As she continues going through her options, the grit mixes with your saliva and slides down your throat, causing you to break out in a heavy cough to get it out. You shove her boot off your mouth, sputtering and spitting. This earns you a sideways kick to the cheek.

"HEY! I didn't say you could do that, stupid broken toy! What are you coughing for anyway?" she asks before kicking you a second time, knocking you down. She then turns her foot and looks at her boot, seeing a slip of wetness where your tongue rubbed against it.

"Ohhhh! You licked my shoe? HAAAHAHAHAhahahaaaa! That's so disgusting, hahaheeehuaheha! No wonder you had to cough and spit, heaahheahahahaHA!" S

he grabs her stomach and rolls over onto her back laughing. You didn't find it particularly funny, but then again, you're relatively sane. With one hand on your sore cheek, you sit back up and prepare to stand, hoping to make a break for it. With shocking spontaneity, she ceases her laughter and uses both feet to kick you in the chest, right back onto your back.

"Stay! I think I finally got an idea what I can do with you. It's going to be so much fun! Heehee!"

What does she have in mind?
12333112222121.title: Toys Can't Talk

choices: Beg her to do something different
123331122221211.content:
"You're going to lick my boots clean!" she exclaims excitedly, bouncing her ass up and down on your stomach. "They got really dirty from running around all the exploded stuff I blew up. And then after you finish licking them, I'll walk around some and you can lick them clean again. Doesn't that sound like a blast!?"

Something about her completely carefree mania is slightly endearing, or would be, if she weren't tormenting you without mercy. Fortunately, she doesn't weigh much, so the bouncing doesn't completely destroy your torso. Still, you try to protest.

"No no no. Please don't make me--"

"What did I say about toys talking!?" she responds angrily, raising a boot to stomp down on yoru mouth again.

"Wait...wait please!" you yell from your prone position, hoping to get her attention. Her boot stops just short of your face, giving you time to speak further. "Please no more kicking! Your boots are filthy! I can't lick them, I might get sick or something!"

She smirks. "Yeah. Duh. That's why you're going to lick them [i]clean[/i]. If they were clean, you wouldn't be able to do that, now would you?"

Finishing her remark, her boot finds its way down onto your face, a bit more gently this time. "Now, get lickin' chicken! I want your tongue to look like the ground!"
123331122221211.title: Fun Times Begin

1233311222212111.content:
You decide that testing the patience of an unhinged girl is unwise and reluctantly stick out your tongue. You slide the tip along her boot, then turn your head to the side and spit out the grime, much to Jinx's discontent.

"HEY!" *stomp* "I didn't say you could spit that out! You have to swallow it. Heehee....yeah, lick my boots clean and swallow everything!"

Hoping to avoid further damage to your face, you take another small lick, swallowing it before it coats your tongue. This way you avoid tasting it. When she sees you swallow, you hear her exclaim "Ewwww! Eugh! You're actually doing it! HAAHAHAHA! So gross!" You carry on licking and swallowing quickly to avoid the flavor, each successive swallow meeting with an interjection of disgust from Jinx, but soon the gritty soot and grime start to coat your tongue regardless. The taste of gunpowder, ash, and dirt fills your mouth, sickening you a bit.

There's no way you'll be able to clean both her boots without throwing up using such small licks. Stifling a gag, you grab her boot, lift it a bit, stick your whole tongue out, and slide it from the heel of her boot to the toe, forming a long stripe of saliva down the center of her boot.

"OHHH myyy goooosh! HAAAA! Blecgh! That's so nasty. Heehahahaa! You are so gross! You're licking like you're actually enjoying this. Hmm...I guess you should be. It's kind of like licking up art work, appreciating my masterpiece of destruction. See how poetic I am?"

While she zones out thinking about her stunning display of poetry, you continue your task, licking all along her boot two, three, then four more times. To your unpleasant surprise, your tongue and mouth have grown so dirty that you're failing to actually clean the shoe, instead just adding slimy layers. You can feel your lips covered with grime and try to clear it off with your tongue but find that your tongue is so saturated with soot that it only makes it worse. You suck your lips inward to get the muck off, then scrape your tongue against your teeth to get it clean. Now feeling as if your tongue and mouth are ready for another round, you swallow the large ball of collected boot dirt, forcing it down your throat but failing to stifle a gag. As a matter of fact, you gag loudly, multiple times.

Jinx yanks her boot from your hands. "You better not puke on my shoe!" She takes a look at the bottom of her boot, her eyes widening at what she sees. "Woah! I definitely didn't expect you to actually do it! I thought I'd have to blow you up for not listening, but you're really cleaning my shoe!"

She hops upwards, tucking her knees under her and landing on top of your torso with her knees. This puts her face right over yours, wide smile and eyes glaring right into your gagging face until you overcome your bout of sickness.

"Your mouth sure is dirty, isn't it plaything? We're gonna have to clean it out...but how? Maybe I can clean it out with bullets! Or..." she lifts her head in thought, her strained expression indicating that trying to come up with a plan is clearly stressing her brain. You see her tongue pushing against both cheeks and occasionally against her cheeks for several seconds while she thinks and you release a few remaining coughs. Finally, she violently grabs your face with her gloved hand and squeezes until you open your mouth.

"Letch righ, obeng wiiine," she says incoherently as she leans right over your face and releasing a massive glob of spit. It stretches down towards your open mouth, and you struggle to turn aside but find her grip surprisingly strong. You have no choice but watch as Jinx's mouth juice drops into your mouth, nestling up against your tongue like a little blob.

"Ha HAH! Now swoosh it around! You better not swallow it yet!" she commands. With that, she slaps your chin to shut your mouth. Regrettably, you begin swooshing her spit around your mouth, using it to lap up as much of the grit caking against your teeth, tongue, and mouth as possible. Your own saliva mixes in, creating a twisted cocktail which you desperately don't want to swallow. You look up at her, your eyes pleading.

"Nowwww," she begins, "you're going to..."
1233311222212111.title: A Taste of Insanity

choices: Beg her for mercy, offering to do anything and everything she says
Select one of the options and hope to get a one up on her.
12333112222121111.content:
"Swallow it! Gulp it up like a disgusting loser!

You close your eyes and gulp down the gritty cocktail. It slides down your tongue and into your throat more smoothly than expected, and you soon realize why. There was a bit of slimy mucus in it that you didn't feel earlier! You hear Jinx snort and open your eyes to see her preparing to burst into laughter, which she does.

"YOU SWALLOWED MY NASTY LOOGEY! HAHAHAHA! You didn't even know, 'cause I can snort 'em up without hawking. HAAhehehahah oohh this is priceless! It's almost as fun as gunning people down, isn't that right, plaything?"

You nod as soon as she mentions the potential for violence. Perhaps you can yet escape with your life, so long as you continue making her manically happy.

"Who's da best? Jinx is da best! Chachacha CHA! Who's the best, huh? Who?" she asks. You aren't sure if it's rhetorical but sputter out her name in response, just in case. She seems pleased.

"That's right! You know it! You're a good little toy, aren't you? Doing whatever I say? Maybe I should give you some kind of reward. Hey, Fishbones, what should I do with my new toy to show how much I care?"

Once again, she speaks in a lower tone of voice, answering her own question. "Since you've tortured him so much already, maybe you can thank him for being a good sport, apologize for hurting him, and let him leave." Your rising hopes are shattered when she replies to herself again.

"HAH! Fat chance! Why would I do that? You're such a fail weapon, Fishbones." She turns her attention to you. "Tell you what, I'll let you choose. You can either get blown up by my rocket launcher, get poked full of holes by my gatling gun, OR get clamped down by my chomper grenades!" She smiles at you, almost sincerely, as if she thinks offering you these options is somehow pleasant.

Well, how do you react?
12333112222121111.title: Crazy Cocktail

123331122221211111.content:
Your jaw drops as you realize you might be about to perish. Deciding that none of the above options particularly suits your fancy, you panic. Gazing directly up into Jinx's manic eyes, you plead with whatever humanity may reside behind that insane glare.

"NO! Please! I licked your boots, I swallowed your spit, and I'll do absolutely anything you say! Just please don't kill me...I'll be good, I promise!"

Her frozen, smiling glare remains fixed on you as she speaks. "Hmm, I don't recall that being one of the options, plaything. What a WIMP!"

"I know, I know...but...think of all the things you could make me do if you kept me alive instead of blowing me up, or or shooting me, or, or, or zapping me! I could be your permanent bootlicker or-"

"Shooting you?" she murmurs curiously to herself. "Zapping you!?" she continues, much louder. "BLOWING YOU UP!?" she shrieks with shrill excitement. "HELL YEAH I WANNA DO ALL THOSE THINGS!"

Your eyes fling open in terror as she leaps up off of you onto her feet and aims her tazer at your prone body. Suddenly, an electrical pulse courses through your body, forcing you to become completely rigid on the ground, shuddering violently.

"N-n-n-n-ooo..o. M...m, mer..cy!" you shout through clenched teeth.

"Mmm..." she ponders momentarily. "Okay!"

With that, Jinx lowers her gatling gun, pointing it directly at your body. "No Mercy it is!"

The last thing you hear as she unloads infinite rounds into your prone form is a chorus consisting of Jinx's shrill laughter crescendoing over the sound of heavy gunfire.

|||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||| ||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||

You awaken to find yourself back at the entrance of the mansion, a familiar voice buzzing into your mind.

"Hello again. Did you enjoy your time with Jinx?" FETISH asks. "She's an unpredictable firecracker. You must be very careful with your choice of words around her lest you over-excite her penchant for destruction and disregard for weaklings. Care to try again?"
123331122221211111.title: Mercy Kill

1233311222212112.content:
You almost puke just thinking about licking the boot in front of you, full or dirt and disgusting things. You turn your head to the side and beg her again.

"No, please, i beg you, i'll do anything but that, i really can't, please!"

You look at Jinx, adding the look of mercy in your eyes in hope you can make her changes her plan. Her creepy smile turns to an irrated grimace. You wait for the boot to strike your face and close your eyes, but the pain doesn't come. Instead, the shadow her boots fade as you check what is going on.

Jinx has her leg rised up in the air and is slowly removing her boot.

"Ooookay little toy. If you don't clean the outside, might as well clean the inside! That's way better. After all, i don't bath much and i might as well enjoy it too."

She turns to look at you, her creepy smile on her face.

"But don't dare to refuse that, i would take it veeeery bad. You don't want to offend me toy, do you? No no, don't respond, my toy never respond, you are no exception."

As she get her foot off her boot, you swallow difficulty. Well, it can't be worse than licking a boot covered in dirt, blood and who knows what.
She doesn't waste time and lower her foot right in front of your face.

"Wait !"

She lower her foot a little more and pinch your nose with her big toe and the other. When she release it, your nose finds its place right in between the toes and the sole.

"Smell." The tone is direct so you comply and breath in while she moves her foot so you can smell almost every part. The odor is strong, but somewhat enticing and you don't find yourself as disgusted as you feared.
During the act, Jinx keep her smile. She is clearly enjoying the "torture". After about 10 second, she rises her foot again.

"Now, do your job toy. Lick !"
1233311222212112.title: Beg her to do something different

choices: She spits in your face and rubs it around with her feet
She smothers you with the stench of her boots and feet
12333112222121121.content:
Managing to avoid having to lick grime off her boots was enough of a success. You decide not to question another command lest she blow you up. Besides, the strong, musky odor from in between her toes is very entrancing.

You stick the tip of your tongue out and taste the salty sweat of her arch which makes her giggle very slightly. When you take a more wholesome lick and turn to spit out the sweat, she quickly slaps your mouth shut with her foot.

"Uh uh uhhh! You wouldn't want any of MY foot gunk to go to waste! I want to see you swish it around and swallow it!" she taunts with a snicker.

You oblige, swishing the sweat around before swallowing it in an audible gulp. It's surprisingly satisfying in flavor, savory as it is. You quickly lash your tongue out and begin lapping up all the sweat from her arch and sole, occasionally stopping to inhale her toes when she scrunches them up against your nose. Finally, she lowers her sticky toes from your nose to your mouth and rubs the big toe against your lips, a knowing smile on her face.

"Open up. I've got a cheesy snack for you!"

You let her slide her big toe into your mouth and proceed to excitedly suck the sticky jam from it. She leans onto her back, laughing at your humiliation at first before beginning to gently moan in pleasure as you give every toe the same treatment.

"Mmm...that actually feels nice. Nobody's ever sucked my feet before, but I get the feeling you'r enjoying this even more than me," she guesses.

Jinx then suddenly leans forward, yanking her foot out of you face and beaming down at you. "What should I do with my little toy next? I want to make sure I have lots of fun with you before I break you. Heehee."
12333112222121121.title: The Toy's Tongue

choices: You keep begging... she finally halts her massacre.
You keep begging but she keeps stomping and kicking you.
You cry for FETISH to intervene.
123331122221212.content:
"How about you beg for mercy and if I don't think you begged enough I kick you until you die! Doesn't that sound great?"

You open your mouth to respond and get kicked full on in the face. "HAAAHAHAHAhahahaaaa, now gimme some begging bitch!"

You look up at her and do what she wants. "Please Jink I... AAAAAGGGGH." You scream in agony as Jinx slams her boot down on the side of your knee, tearing the tendon and ripping your joint.

"Hahahhahaha beg more! Come on bitch beg!" You manage to stifle your screams and open your mouth only for her boot to come smashing down on your face breaking your nose. She grinds her boot into your nose and mouth grinding cartilage and making your lips rip up against your teeth.

"I don't hear begging, come on BEG!" She cackles as you can't speak, all you can do is cry mangled sounds of agony. You grab at her boot and try to pull her off, adrenaline must have given you strength as you actually dislodge her and she rolls to the ground springing up grinning like a mad woman.

"PLEASE JINX, MERCY, I'LL DO WHATEVER YOU SAY!" You cry desperately as she rushes over to you, you had propped yourself up on your one good knee. She flies forward kneeing you in the face, battering your already mangled face. You fall back to the ground arms flailing. She quickly pins your wrist with one boot and then savagely stomps down on your hand.

"HAHAHAHHAHA look at those little wormy fingers bend and break! This is so much fun!!!"
123331122221212.title: Forcing you to beg for mercy while she kicks yo...

choices: He does and you are taken back to the room full of doors
The simulation pauses... but FETISH has some news for you.
1233311222212123.content:
"FETISH STOP THE SIMULATION!!!" You cry in panic and fear. This wasn't what you wanted, yes you liked feet but not this cruel barbaric torture at the hands of a psycho!!

Does Fetish end it?
1233311222212123.title: You cry for FETISH to intervene.

123331122222.content: The next door bears claw marks along with a sigil of one of the ice queens, Sejuani. The hall grows colder still farther down. It's icy!
123331122222.title: Brrr....what's so cold?

1233311222222.content: The next door belongs to the Ice Queen herself: Lissandra. Do you allow yourself to freeze in her presence, or continue down the hall?
1233311222222.title: Brave the frost

1233312.content:
You awaken to find yourself alone on a stone table.

"Welcome to Summoner's Rift," says an ethereal voice ans you begin to come to your senses.

You notice that you are wearing a brown cloak and some boots (of speed). You feel as if your your body is now coursing with some mystical power.

"Select a champion to summon to the Fields of Justice," says the ethereal voice.

You quickly realize that you must be a summoner and that you now have the ability to call upon champions from the League of Legends. You excitedly think about which female champion's feet you would like to see up-close and personal. Feeling adventurous in this new world you decide that you will summon a champion that is Non-Human, at least not entirely. You quickly make up your mind and use your new powers to call forth a beautiful champion with beautiful (and not entirely human) feet.

The champion that appears before you is...
1233312.title: Non-Human Champions

choices: You begin to take off her boots
She asks you to take them off
12333121.content:
Before you appears the mighty half-dragon Shyvana dressed in her Ironscale armor. She appears confused for a second before realizing that she has been summoned to the Fields of Justice once again. She is sweating and it appears as is she has just arrived from another great battle. You look down at her boots thinking to yourself how sore and sweaty her feet must be after running through the jungle all the time. She looks at you and examines you for a second.

"Hail summoner," says Shyvana. "You must be new because I haven't seen you around the League before. What is your name?"

You tell her your name and ask her why she looks so tired.

"I just got finished with a contest of Dominion," she says panting. "They had me running all over The Crystal Scar. I am a fearsome warrior but I do not fancy 30 minutes of running around using Burnout."

You notice that there are no minions spawning so it seems there is no match going on at the moment. You want to take this opportunity to see, or perhaps even smell, the beautiful half-dragon's feet.

"Well it looks like there isn't a match right now," you say to her. "Why not take this chance to relax and get comfortable?"

"That would be most welcome." says Shyvana.

1251321.content:
"Ehhhhh! Gramps, this is boring!" the 12 year old complained, disapproval clear in her voice. "When can we head home? This is too much to ask of even a college student!"
         You smiled at Arthur, her grandfather, and he smiled back. Arthur had taken the time out of his busy research schedule in order to buy you something to eat, a sort of repayment for all of the help you'd been to him and Rebecca over the months prior.
         "Well that's not very nice Rebecca," he replied mockingly "besides, we're here for Yugi's enjoyment, not yours."
         "He doesn't look very excited either, and I highly doubt that being trapped in a derelict restaurant with an old man is his idea of entertainment either" she prodded. It was hard to discern whether she meant harm by this, or was merely joking around. Either way, you definitely didn't want Arthur thinking that. You opened your mouth to object, however was cut off by Arthur himself.
         "Haha, maybe so" he finished. "Well, if you've both finished eating, let's be setting off. As much as i'd like to treat you further, Yugi, unfortunately I have a busy day ahead of me; I told my colleagues that i'd meet them in..." he raised his wrist and slid his sleeve back, checking his watch. "Oh gosh! I have twenty minutes!"
         "Of course professor," you smiled happily, a little amused by his sudden outburst, "I wouldn't want you to be late, especially not for my sake. Thanks for everything you've done today, I really appreciate it."
         The professor gave you a friendly nod of acknowledgement, before reaching behind him for his jacket that he'd hung over his seat, putting it back on. Whilst Arthur was checking his pockets to make sure nothing had been stolen, you glanced at Rebecca, who was now staring out into space through the restaurant window, most likely trying to kill time. You ducked your head and reached underneath the table to pick up the professor's bags for him whilst he was getting up, and paused.

Rebecca's navy sock clad feet dangled cutely beneath the table, her black flats on the floor. Her socks wrinkled as she repeatedly spread and closed her toes, trying to cool them in the humid air of the restaurant. You could see where sweat had stuck some of the fabric to the soles of her feet, as well as between her toes, outlining every curve of her size five tootsies. You tried to avert your gaze, but every toe flex made it harder. Only when those navy socks frantically started searching for their shoes did you manage to pull yourself away, quickly grabbing the professor's bag, standing up and handing it to him, trying to hide the fluster that you'd just gotten yourself into. Rebecca stood up shortly after, putting her own jacket on.

"Now i'm sorry you two, but I really have to run. Yugi, you don't live far from here do you? I'm afraid you might have to walk." You could tell it pained Arthur to say this, being such a considerate man, however, he was late, and walking home really didnâ€™t seem a terrible option. Maybe you could meet up with Joey or someone; he was probably bored out of his mind.
         "Don't worry about it Professor Hawkins, I couldn't ask more of you anyway" you smiled, trying to appear as honest as possible, you didn't want him to feel guilty.
         "You're just like your grandfather, Yugi. Such a nice young man," he lowered himself to your ear and whispered, hiding his mouth with his hand, "maybe Rebecca could learn something from you." He laughed, and you couldn't help but blush slightly.
         "Hey! I heard that!" Rebecca shouted in defiance. You and Arthur exchanged smiles once again.

- - - -

Arthur waved goodbye as he pulled off in his car, leaving you and Rebecca standing on the pavement outside the restaurant, debating what to do next.
         "Hey, um... Yugi?" Rebecca mumbled shyly after a period of silence, "Are you busy?" Rebecca had had a crush on you for a while now, but she was never usually shy about talking to you, regardless of the subject; this had surprised you a little. "I was just wondering if you'd like to come back to mine is all..."

14232.content:
You walk past the dusty and run down 1950s door and ponder the 1960s and 1970s doors. These were the foundation of Marvel and established most of the characters and concepts still around today.

The 1960s door is garishly coloured in green and purple. It could be a lot of fun to visit the 60s! It was a more innocent time in comics free of gore and with far less death and destruction. You think which female characters you could meet in that era... The Invisible Girl, Marvel Girl, Pepper Pots, The Enchantress, Princess Python, The Wasp, Alicia Masters (that could be risky), Sif (that could also be risky), The Scarlet Witch, The Black Widow... You could hang out with Tony Stark when he was a carefree playboy and meet all the girls, or you could get groovy with Gwen Stacy and Mary Jane.

Then there's the 70s... chaotic with lots of horror themed stuff and with the introduction of more female characters. All the old ones are still around though they'd changed and grown up a bit, but there's also...

Shanna the She-Devil, The Cat, Neckra, Mantis, Spider-Woman, The Gypsy Moth, Satana, Moondragon, Gamora, The Matriarch of the Universal Church of Truth, Death, Valkyrie, Storm, Thundra, Mantis, Ms Marvel...

The door is all ornate with runes and astrological symbols on it.

"In either door you will arrive in New York. From there you can get anywhere, as you know from the comic books. The Baxter Building is a good place to visit if you want to travel."

It's tempting, but there are still more options.
14232.title: The Marvel Age

142323.content:
Next is the door to the 1980s. It's a stylish black and white.

The 80s was a good deal more serious and also saw an explosion in the number of female characters and the way in which they were portrayed, so if you go in there you might get more realistic women... The old characters are mostly knocking about other than Gwen Stacy and The Matriarch. And Mantis is gone after marrying a tree, but there's also...

She-Hulk, Titania, Volcana, Lorelei, the 80s Spider-woman, 80s Captain Marvel, The White Queen, Tarianna, The Black Cat, Dazzler, Jean DeWolf, Silver Sable, Viper, The Sisters of Sin, Circuit Breaker, Bethany Cabe, Rachel Summers, Aurora, Marina, Dagger (though she's a little young like all the New Mutants), Marrionette, Nebula...

Then there's the 90s. The door is weird and out of proportion and has a bright pink triangle over one corner about some crossover and is covered in plastic. There seems to be a Venom trading card stuck to it as well and a label announcing a "Fifth issue anniversary special!"

Ah, the 90s. This could be tricky as feet were hidden, non-existant or blobs with many of the artists. It was a decade of T&A, both visable at the same time. You'll have to hope the simulator compensates based on your tastes. Who was new in the 90s?

There were a load of Marvel UK characters like Motormouth (if you can stand the swearing), Shriek, Doctor Kafka, Infinity, a lot of mutants and the New Mutants are a bit older too. And women wear a lot less.

Decisions, decisions...
